: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
! ------------- Building java arguments ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_KAFKA.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "SendMessageAction"
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_KAFKA.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JAVA_COMMAND@UNIX
! Topic : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KFK_TOPIC# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_KAFKA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_KFK_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KFK_CMD#, " -topic &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Message : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KFK_MESSAGE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_KAFKA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_KFK_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KFK_CMD#, " -message &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Retry Count : SET &UC4RB_KFK_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KFK_CMD#, " -retrycount &UC4RB_KFK_RETRY_COUNT#")

&UC4RB_KFK_CMD#
